channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AC or DC: Which Is Better?
item.description: Your gadgets run on direct current, but the electricity in your home is alternating current. What’s up with that?

item.title: 11 Best Laptops for College Students (2025), Including Tablets and 2-in-1s
item.description: Whatever your higher-ed goals, these laptops, tablets, and 2-in-1s will help you crush them.

item.title: OpenAI reportedly raises $8.3B at $300B valuation
item.description: The oversubscribed round came months ahead of schedule, and is part of OpenAI's strategy to raise $40 billion.

item.title: Instagram now requires users to have at least 1,000 followers to go live
item.description: Until now, Instagram allowed anyone to go live, regardless of their follower count or whether their account was public or private.

item.title: Bike Friday All-Day Lightweight Electric Bike Review: It Comes in Purple
item.description: I ordered the world’s smallest folding Bosch ebike in purple, and now it’s the only bike I want to ride.

item.title: TikTok launches ‘TikTok Pro’ in Europe with built-in charity program
item.description: The app features TikTok's new "Sunshine Programme," which allows users to support charitable organizations.

item.title: The First Widespread Cure for HIV Could Be in Children
item.description: Evidence is growing that some HIV-infected infants, if given antiretroviral drugs early in life, are able to suppress their viral loads to undetectabl...

item.title: Term sheets, traction, and truth bombs: inside the Series A mindset at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: At TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, taking place October 27–29 at Moscone West in San Francisco, we’re getting real about what it takes to land a Series A in ...

item.title: Truecaller’s call recording feature won’t work on iPhones from Sept. 30
item.description: The app's call recording feature will no longer be available on iPhones starting September 30. Users with saved call recordings can either download th...

item.title: Vivobarefoot's Sensus Shoes Are Like Gloves for Your Feet
item.description: Vivobarefoot’s barely there shoes are perfect for casual wear, workouts, trail running, and walking around town.
